summary: In several religions, like Judaism, Christianity, Islam, and Baháʼí Faith, Gabriel is a powerful angel who delivers messages from God to people. He is known for announcing important births, like those of John the Baptist and Jesus in the Christian Bible. Gabriel is also in the Hebrew Bible and the Quran, often helping prophets understand their visions. Many Christians consider him a saint. In Islam, Gabriel is famous for revealing the Quran's first verses to the Prophet Muhammad.
title: Gabriel
